name: Cinemalogical LLC
tag_list: social-network, kids, privacy, safe, children, youth, toy, toys, club-penguin, webkinz
overview:
FaceChipz.com is secure social network for kids who trade and collect FaceChipz friendship tokens.

FaceChipz.com has all the features of a real social network â€“ but with one big difference: kids can ONLY communicate with others theyâ€™ve physically exchanged FaceChipz tokens with â€“ no strangers are allowed. No one can arbitrarily contact them. No one can search for them. Itâ€™s the social network they collect, but doesnâ€™t collect them.

FaceChipz have the weight, look and feel of a high-end casino chips – on the head-side is …a face – an emoticon. On the tail side is a code. The initial collection has 200, (now on sale at ToysRus).

This is how FaceChipz works: kids register each FaceChipz token online by entering the unique code on the back of the chip into the FaceChipz code reader. Once the FaceChipz are registered, kids (â€œGiversâ€) hand them out to friends or to someone (â€œReceiverâ€) they would like to become friends with. The Receiver goes online and enters in the same unique code from the back of the FaceChipz. The FaceChipz database confirms the friendship and the two are linked. Once a FaceChipz token is registered by both the Giver and Receiver, it cannot be used again. (The code becomes invalid â€“ ensuring that if a chip fell into unwanted hands, a stranger could not link to the previous holder.)

The website was designed for tweens who want to communicate freely with their friends, but who arenâ€™t comfortable with navigating an open social network. For the children the site is fun and the chips are collectible. For the parents the site is SAFER and the chips affordable. FaceChipz has also been awarded the Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB.org) and SociallySafe.com’s cyber safety best practices seals.
